ComicInfo.Title: Great Moments in History; Transylvanian Summertime; One Evening in Greenwich Village; Interviews the Jerker!; Hudd and Dini and Ye Hang Ups; Tarius the Planet; Cracked Rock 'n' Roll Museum!; Medical One-Shots!; High Adventure; Oh, My Aching Back!; Hazards of:; Tales from the Creep; One Day in the Dawn of Civilization; Ripper's Believe It or Bail!; The Sabotron!; One Day in Chinese Acupuncture Hospital; Ghostbuggers II; Breaking into Cracked's Offices; Cracked Looks at Baseball Trading Cards; Calling All Hands
ComicInfo.Summary:
King William the Impatient invents air mail with the catapult.
A vampire goes moon-bathing.
Hudd and Dini tunnel into a Ye Hang Ups cartoon!
A woman tries to murder her husband while a homicidal Santa Claus is on the loose.
Hudd and Dini break into Cracked's offices and demand to see Vic Martin, their creator. However, he turns out to be the guard wearing a disguise.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:40:45. [Issue ID 250611]
